data.title: F1 Score vs ROC AUC vs Accuracy vs PR AUC: Which Evaluation Metric Should You Choose?
data.description: PR AUC and F1 Score are very robust evaluation metrics that work great for many classification problems but from my experience more commonly used metrics are Accuracy and ROC AUC.
